name: spo-copy-directory-structure-to-sharepoint-list
title: Copy the folder structure of a directory to a SharePoint list
shortDescription: Copies the folder structure of a directory to a SharePoint list
longDescription: Say we have a user who has written a lot of flows and PowerBI reports and is complaining tha she is getting throttled in SharePoint quite often.
We need to see all the calls being mad by that user and/or to particular sites to attempt to narrow down the issues.
This script will scan the ULS Logs for the last week looking for all access by a user an or to a site and create an excel file summarizing the activity.

thumbnails.alt: A preview image of Copy the folder structure of a directory to a sharepoint list
